auth.bySigningIn: By signing in, you agree to our

personalInfo.title: Personal Information
personalInfo.name: Full name and identification details
personalInfo.dateOfBirth: Date of birth for age verification
personalInfo.medicalInfo: Medical history, symptoms, and health records

oauthInfo.title: OAuth Provider Information
oauthInfo.description: When you sign in using social media accounts, we collect:
oauthInfo.google: Google: Email, name, profile picture, and basic profile information
oauthInfo.facebook: Facebook: Email, name, profile picture, and public profile data
oauthInfo.apple: Apple: Email, name (if provided), and unique identifier
oauthInfo.microsoft: Microsoft: Email, name, profile picture, and basic profile information

howWeUseInfo.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
howWeUseInfo.provideServices: Provide and maintain our healthcare services
howWeUseInfo.communicate: Communicate with you about appointments and services
howWeUseInfo.improveServices: Improve our services and user experience
howWeUseInfo.compliance: Comply with legal and regulatory requirements

healthcareProviders.title: Healthcare Providers
healthcareProviders.description: We share your medical information with authorized healthcare providers to deliver medical services and coordinate care.

serviceProviders.title: Service Providers
serviceProviders.description: We may share information with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating our platform, such as cloud hosting, analytics, and communication services.

legalRequirements.title: Legal Requirements
legalRequirements.description: We may disclose information when required by law, court order, or to protect our rights, property, or safety, or that of our users.

dataSecurity.title: 4. Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We implement comprehensive security measures to protect your personal and medical information:
dataSecurity.encryption: End-to-end encryption for all data transmission and storage
dataSecurity.accessControls: Strict access controls and authentication mechanisms
dataSecurity.auditLogs: Comprehensive audit logging of all data access
dataSecurity.hipaaCompliance: Full compliance with HIPAA security requirements
dataSecurity.regularAudits: Regular security audits and vulnerability assessments

yourRights.title: 5. Your Rights
yourRights.access: Access your personal information and medical records
yourRights.deletion: Request deletion of your information (subject to legal requirements)
yourRights.portability: Request data portability to another service
yourRights.objection: Object to certain types of data processing

cookies.title: 6. Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience:
cookies.essential: Essential cookies for basic functionality and security
cookies.analytics: Analytics cookies to understand usage patterns
cookies.preferences: Preference cookies to remember your settings

dataRetention.title: 7. Data Retention
dataRetention.description: We retain your information for as long as necessary to provide services, comply with legal obligations, and resolve disputes. Medical records are retained according to applicable healthcare regulations.

changes.title: 8. Changes to This Policy
changes.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the 'Last Updated' date.

contact.title: 9. Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:
contact.addressValue: Adyela Healthcare, 123 Medical Plaza, Suite 100, San Francisco, CA 94102

hipaa.title: 10. HIPAA Compliance
hipaa.description: As a healthcare service provider, we are fully compliant with the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA). This includes:
hipaa.administrative: Administrative safeguards for workforce training and access management
hipaa.physical: Physical safeguards for data centers and device security
hipaa.technical: Technical safeguards including encryption and access controls
hipaa.breachNotification: Breach notification procedures and incident response
